DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Distance From Nipple Measurement Millimeter Float
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for questions capturing the measured distance from the lesion to the nipple in millimeters.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any observable abnormal structural change in a bodily part._The space separating two objects or points._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._The pigmented protuberance on the surface of the breast through which milk is drawn from the breast._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
